Hi Anastasios,

What Chris suggested is the first thing that also came to my mind but I suggest you to send this question to EnergyPlus mailing list or unmethours website ([https://unmethours.com/](https://unmethours.com/)) and let us know if you got any better solution. I think being able to overwrite the the boundary condition of a surface is something that is worth to apply to honeybee in general. I'm not sure if you can do that in EnergyPlus though.

Mostapha
